translation.en: Hi. Or should that be:  How do you do?
translation.es: Hola. ¿O debería decir: Cómo están ustedes?

translation.en: I'm Zoe. I'm 15 and--
Uh, guys? Guys? Wrong girl.
I'm the out- of- place American over here,
translation.es: Soy la estadounidense fuera de lugar aquí,

translation.en: and this is England.
Beautiful, isn't it?
This place smells of cow.
Yeah, now you come to mention it, there's a definite aroma.
translation.es: Sí, ahora que lo dices, hay un aroma.

translation.en: That's my little sister, Rosie.
She's more LA than a wannabe actor sipping on kale juice.
translation.es: Es más de Los Ángeles que un aspirante a actor que bebe jugo de kale.

translation.en: We've been walking for days.
Are we lost?
I know these roads like the back of my hand. I'm not lost.
translation.es: Conozco estas calles como la palma de mi mano. No estoy perdida.

translation.en: That's my mom. She's totally lost, in more ways than one.
translation.es: Ella es mi mamá. Está totalmente perdida, en más de un aspecto.

translation.en: - Ooh, look at that. -
Is that a buzzard?
And that, my friends, is a really big horse.
translation.es: Y eso, amigos míos, es un caballo muy grande.

translation.en: - Excuse me. -
Sorry. Hope my sister didn't get in the way of your massive horse.
translation.es: Perdón. Ojala mi hermanita no haya estorbado a tu enorme caballo.

translation.en: My party shoes.
Did someone say party?
- Gramps! - Zoe!
But how wonderful to see you!
Ah. I thought you were going to camp. Where's your dad?
translation.es: Creí que irían a acampar. ¿Y tu papá?

translation.en: Long story.
Dad, you're not supposed to be driving.
translation.es: Papá, se supone que no debes conducir.

translation.en: I'm not supposed to be driving a car.
This isn't a car.
- Now, who wants a lift to the house? - Me.
translation.es: - Ahora, ¿quién quiere que la lleve? - Yo.

translation.en: Get on the back there. Right, that's it.
Welcome home.
Hit the gas, Gramps.
Don't encourage him.
Dad, slow down!
Things in LA got kind of complicated kind of quickly.
translation.es: Las cosas en Los Ángeles se complicaron un poco con bastante rapidez.

translation.en: And I figure a summer vacay
translation.es: Y supongo que unas vacaciones de verano

translation.en: on a tiny island off the coast of England is just what I need.
translation.es: en una pequeña isla en la costa de Inglaterra es lo que necesito.

translation.en: Zero parental stress, zero weirdly possessive friends
translation.es: Sin padres estresantes, sin amigas extrañamente posesivas,

translation.en: - and absolutely zero drama. -
translation.es: y absolutamente sin nada de drama.

translation.en: Gramps, watch out!
It's okay, I'm fine.
Hmm, I'll get back to you about that whole zero drama thing.
translation.es: No estoy tan segura sobre lo de sin drama.

translation.en: ♪ No matter what you're doin' ♪
Come in, come in, come in, come in.
Yeah, yeah. Put it down.
It's all exactly the same.
This is new.
- What do you think? - That is very British.
translation.es: - ¿Qué les parece? - Eso es muy británico.

translation.en: So, what happened to Huck?
- Oh, Dad's working. - Yeah, really hard.
- It's all good, though. I have his ticket. - You'd really rather spend the summer
translation.es: Está bien. Tengo su boleto. ¿Prefieres pasar el verano con tu abuelo y no con tus amigos?

translation.en: with your old grandpa than your friends?
translation.es: ¿Prefieres pasar el verano con tu abuelo y no con tus amigos?

translation.en: Yeah. They'll be there when I get back.
Probably.
Mmm. Smells good, Gramps. What are you cooking?
- Rabbit. - Mom, Grandpa's cooking Peter Rabbit.
translation.es: - Conejo. - Mamá, el abuelo cocina a Peter Rabbit.

translation.en: - Couldn't you have done egg and chips? - She should know what real food is.
translation.es: ¿No podías hacer huevos y papas? Ella tiene que saber lo que es comida de verdad.

translation.en: I suppose it's all rehydrated tofu burgers in LA.
translation.es: Supongo que en Los Ángeles comen puras hamburguesas de tofu rehidratadas.

translation.en: Are you really going there already?
I'm just saying, it'll be good for them to spend time somewhere real.
translation.es: Solo digo que les hará bien pasar tiempo en un lugar real.

translation.en: Somewhere with a bit of soul.
translation.es: Un lugar que tenga algo de alma.

translation.en: - LA has soul, too. - Oh.  If you'd get on a plane, I could show you.
translation.es: Los Ángeles también tiene alma. Si subes a un avión, te lo mostraré.

translation.en: - The last thing I need is LA. - Perfect.
translation.es: - No necesito ir a Los Ángeles. - Perfecto.

translation.en: I'm doing fine.
Dear Maggie. The light will come through again. Love, Mama.
translation.es: Querida Maggie: La luz volverá a asomar. Con amor, mamá.

translation.en: Cryptic. I like it.
Mom, why isn't the Wi- Fi working?
translation.es: Mamá, ¿por qué no funciona el wifi?

translation.en: - What's a Wi- Fi? - Mom!
That's it. That's it. I'm calling the embassy.
translation.es: Se acabó. Llamaré a la embajada.

translation.en: Wi- Fi is a basic human right.
translation.es: El wifi es un derecho humano básico.

translation.en: This is what I wanted, what I needed.
translation.es: Esto es lo que yo quería, lo que necesitaba.

translation.en: Just peace and quiet and...
Hello, jet lag.
Zoe!
- Rosie's missing. -
- I've looked everywhere. - She's probably gone-- ugh! For a walk.
translation.es: - Busqué por todas partes. - Debe de haber salido a caminar.

translation.en: - Rosie doesn't do walks. - She doesn't know these roads.
translation.es: Rosie no sale a caminar. No conoce estos caminos. Ni los peligros.

translation.en: - She doesn't know the dangers. - We're getting a little hysterical.
translation.es: No conoce estos caminos. Ni los peligros. Creo que nos estamos poniendo un poco histéricos.

translation.en: - She's only been gone five minutes. - Grandpa, please, not helping.
translation.es: - Se fue hace cinco minutos. - Abuelo, por favor. No ayudas.

translation.en: Mom, relax, breathe.
Remember your Yogalates.
Right, yes. My breathing. Uh...
I'll go wait by the phone.
I'll find her. She couldn't have gone far.
translation.es: La encontraré. No pudo haber ido lejos.

translation.en: - Is your mother always this... - Recently, yes.
translation.es: - ¿Tu madre siempre es tan...? - Últimamente, sí.

translation.en: You're not really here to nurse your invalid grandfather, are you?
translation.es: No has venido a cuidar a tu abuelo inválido, ¿verdad?

translation.en: - No, Grandpa. - Thank goodness for that.
- I gotta go find Rosie. - Yeah.
translation.es: - Iré a buscar a Rosie. - Sí.

translation.en: Rosie!
This place is so beautiful.
It needs a coffee shop right there, but other than that, all good.
translation.es: Vendría bien una cafetería por allí, pero aparte de eso, todo bien.

translation.en: Ow. Excuse me, hi.
Hey, um, I don't suppose you've seen a ten- year- old girl about yea high,
translation.es: Hola. ¿Vieron a una niña de 10 años así de alta que parece una bola furiosa de brillos?

translation.en: resembles an angry ball of glitter?
translation.es: ¿Vieron a una niña de 10 años así de alta que parece una bola furiosa de brillos?

translation.en: - You're American. - Oh, no, no, no, I'm French.
Really?
Is she serious?
I've never met a French person before.
translation.es: Nunca conocí a una persona francesa.

translation.en: Bonjour, stranger.
Oh, she's serious.
Okay, so, you haven't seen her?
Just because she's my little sister and she's on the loose.
translation.es: Es mi hermana menor, y no la encontramos.

translation.en: No, but we'll keep an eye out.
- Okay, all right. Thank you. Thank you. - Wait, wait, wait. Um...
What are you-- Why-- Um--
Translation: Who are you and what are you doing here?
translation.es: Traducción: ¿quién eres y qué haces aquí?

translation.en: Oh, well, I'm Zoe.
I'm staying here for the summer at my gramps' house, over there.
translation.es: Me quedaré aquí todo el verano en casa de mi abuelo, allá.

translation.en: That's right by the stables. You should totally come and hang out.
translation.es: Junto a los establos. Deberías venir con nosotras.

translation.en: You know, I'm not exactly what you'd call outdoorsy.
translation.es: No me caracterizo por salir mucho al aire libre.

translation.en: It's not all outdoorsy. Some of it's indoorsy.
translation.es: No sería salir. A veces estaremos dentro.

translation.en: Yeah, it's pony camp soon.
translation.es: Sí, pronto será el campamento de ponis.

translation.en: Which is gonna be horsesome.
Horsesome's my word.
- It's a combination of horse and awesome. - Got it.
translation.es: - Combinación de caballo y asombroso. - Bien.

translation.en: Girls!
Raven's escaped.
- What? - I want everyone back in the yard now.
- He's been stolen. He must have been. - You don't know that.
translation.es: - Lo robaron. Debió ser así. - No sabes eso.

translation.en: The security in this place is utterly inadequate.
translation.es: La seguridad aquí es totalmente inadecuada. Llamaré a la policía.

translation.en: - I'm gonna call the police - Let's not get ahead of ourselves.
translation.es: La seguridad aquí es totalmente inadecuada. Llamaré a la policía. No nos adelantemos.

translation.en: - I'll drive around, see if I can find him. - Am I in a Jane Austen novel?
translation.es: - Iré a buscarlo en el auto. - ¿Estoy en una novela de Jane Austen?

translation.en: Have I gone back in time?
- What is this place? - Marcus.
You've got to be kidding me.
No one looks like that in real life.
translation.es: Nadie luce así en la vida real.

translation.en: - Did I say that out loud? - Huh?
Let's hope Raven comes quietly.
Who's Raven?
- He's-- - Just a horse.
- A scary horse. - I'm really worried, Daddy.
translation.es: - Es un caballo. - Aterrador. Estoy preocupada, papi. Está descontrolado.

translation.en: He's totally out of control.
I'm sure your sister will be fine.
- Can I borrow this? - Of course.
Uh, that's my bike.
Be careful.
That girl is the definition of horsesome.
translation.es: Esa chica es la definición de asballoso.

translation.en: It'll catch on, Jade. Just you wait.
translation.es: Ya se te pegará, Jade. Ten paciencia.

translation.en: Okay, detective mode engaged.
Where would a very small, very angry little sister hide?
translation.es: ¿Dónde se ocultaría una hermanita muy pequeña y enojada?

translation.en: Okay, let's see.
Pier, picturesque.
But no Rosie.
Woods, whole lot of trees.
No Rosie.
Rosie!
Oh, God, no.
Oh, no.
Oh, no, please don't hurt her.
- That's the girl looking for her sister. - Rope and sedatives now, Marcus.
translation.es: - Es la chica que busca a su hermana. - Cuerda y sedantes. Ya, Marcus.

translation.en: Just stay very still!
No, no, no. Okay.
You must be Raven. Okay.
It's okay, it's okay.
It's okay.
Okay, okay, okay. Relax, relax.
It's all okay.
It's okay.
Wait, wait, wait. Look.
I've never seen him so calm.
translation.es: Nunca lo había visto tan calmado.

translation.en: Rough day, huh?
Yeah. Yeah.
Just stay very still.
- - Hey, hey, no, no.
- Whoa, whoa, whoa. - Here.
Stop it, don't be like that. Your friends are here to take you home.
translation.es: Oye, basta, no seas así. Tus amigos vienen a llevarte a casa.

translation.en: - - Whoa, whoa. Hey, hey, hey, Britain's Next Top Model... I don't think he likes that pointy thing.
translation.es: Oye, próximo modelo top británico... No le gustan esas cosas puntiagudas.

translation.en: - Easy, Miss America. It's just a sedative. - We just need to get him under control.
translation.es: - Calma, Miss EE.UU. Es un sedante. - Hay que tenerlo bajo control.

translation.en: He was under control.
No needles. No sedatives. Just back off.
I said, back off.
Okay, I get it, I get it. You like to be free. I get it.
translation.es: De acuerdo. Entiendo. Te gusta ser libre. Entiendo.

translation.en: What's your name?
- Zoe. - Okay, Zoe.
Raven seems to really like you.
translation.es: Parece que le gustas mucho a Raven.

translation.en: Could you help us get him back to the stables?
Uh, look, I would love to help you with your scary horse,
translation.es: Me encantaría ayudarles con su caballo aterrador,

translation.en: I really would, but I need to find my sister.
translation.es: en serio, pero necesito encontrar a mi hermana.

translation.en: Thing is, it's kind of you or the sedative.
translation.es: O lo calmas tú o el sedante.

translation.en: Listen. If you help us out, we'll help you find your sister.
translation.es: Escucha. Si nos ayudas, te ayudaremos a encontrar a tu hermana.

translation.en: - Okay, what do you want me to do? - We need to get this rope clipped on him.
translation.es: - Bien, ¿qué quieren que haga? - Engánchale esta cuerda.

translation.en: Okay, okay.
Hey. Okay.
Oh, hey, hey. Shh, shh. Come here.
That's great. We need you to walk him back to the stables,
and we'll be right behind you. If he does anything, we are right there.
translation.es: Estaremos detrás de ti. Si hace algo, estaremos allí.

translation.en: Okay, okay. All right.
Shh. It's okay, it's okay.
Couple of horse thefts on the mainland. It could be related.
translation.es: Robaron caballos en el continente. Podría estar relacionado.

translation.en: Horse thieves?
- I knew it. - He only said it could be.
translation.es: - Lo sabía. - Solo es una posibilidad.

translation.en: It must have been a gang.
It'd take at least four men, four big men, to control that horse. He's utterly wild.
translation.es: Se necesitarían cuatro hombres fuertes para controlar a ese caballo. Es salvaje.

translation.en: Daddy.
This is so going on my blog.
translation.es: Esto irá directo a mi blog.

translation.en: Thank you so much, Zoe. We've got it from here.
Ted, can you give me a hand?
Steady, boy.
Steady, boy.
Take him to the stables and get him checked over.
See you soon... I guess.
Okay, everyone, show's over. Let's get back to work.
translation.es: Bueno, se acabó el espectáculo. A trabajar.

translation.en: - It was a false alarm, Officer. - It's Derek.
- I'm so sorry to waste your time. - No time wasted.
translation.es: - Lamento su pérdida de tiempo. - No fue perdido.

translation.en: It's always good to see you. I mean, to see the yard.
translation.es: Siempre es lindo verte. Digo, ver el establo.

translation.en: Although I'd advise a review of your alarms and CCTV.
translation.es: Aunque les aconsejaría que revisaran sus alarmas y cámaras.

translation.en: We'll look into it.
Yes, you will.
How's my favorite horse whisperer?
I'm okay. I just need to find my sister.
translation.es: Bien, pero debo hallar a mi hermana.

translation.en: Right, of course.
Girls.
Wait, wait, wait.
These are Rosie's.
She's not out there. She's in here. Somewhere.
translation.es: No está lejos, está aquí. En algún lugar.

translation.en: Seriously, I'm like some kind of wilderness tracker, right?
translation.es: En serio, soy una especie de rastreadora en tierras salvajes, ¿no?

translation.en: We'll help you look. We know all the best hiding places here.
translation.es: Te ayudaremos a buscar. Conocemos los mejores escondites.

translation.en: - Thanks, girls. - We were playing hide- and- seek once,
translation.es: - Gracias, chicas. - Una vez jugamos a las escondidas

translation.en: and I got stuck in a Portaloo.
translation.es: y quedé atorada en un baño químico.

translation.en: - I thought she'd gone home. - I was in there for six hours.
translation.es: - Creí que se había ido a casa. - Estuve allí seis horas.

translation.en: I got the best photo of you and Raven. Totally posting it.
translation.es: Tengo una foto fabulosa de ti y Raven. La publicaré ahora mismo.

translation.en: Mysterious Frenchwoman hypnotizes crazy horse.
translation.es: Francesa misteriosa hipnotiza a caballo loco.

translation.en: I didn't hypnotize him.
And she's not French.
- It's still huge. - Rosie?
Raven's the wildest horse in the yard.
translation.es: Raven es el más salvaje del establo.

translation.en: What's his problem?
No one knows for sure.
He never lets anyone close enough to find out.
translation.es: No deja que se acerquen a averiguarlo.

translation.en: Rosie?
Apart from you.
Maybe he's your destiny.
- Rosie, are you in here? - Maybe.
Rosie, are you-- ?
Hey, boy.
This really isn't a very good hiding place.
translation.es: Este no es un buen escondite.

translation.en: - Raven's in here, for starters. - It's okay. It's okay, it's just me.
translation.es: - Raven está aquí. - Está bien, solo soy yo.

translation.en: We should probably go.
- Careful. - It's okay.
So, I'm looking for my little sister.
She's a runaway, like you.
translation.es: Le gusta escapar, como a ti.

translation.en: Here. See if he wants one of these.
translation.es: Ten. Ve si quiere un poco.

translation.en: Ah, so, that's how you brought Raven home.
translation.es: Así trajiste a Raven a casa.

translation.en: - You bribed him with sweets. - Told you it'd be something like that.
translation.es: - Lo sobornaste con dulces. - Te dije que era algo así.

translation.en: I mean, it is pretty impressive.
You know, you are the talk of the yard.
translation.es: Estás en boca de todo el establo.

translation.en: - I am? - I'm Mia.
- I hope these two aren't bothering you. - No, no, they're cool.
translation.es: - Espero que ellas no te aburran. - No. Son geniales.

translation.en: We were helping her look for her sister.
translation.es: La ayudábamos a buscar a su hermana.

translation.en: - I suppose you think Raven's eaten her. - Of course not.
translation.es: - Y creen que Raven se la comió. - Claro que no.

translation.en: - Have you? - Run along. I can take things from here.
translation.es: - No lo creíste, ¿o sí? - Pueden irse, me encargaré.

translation.en: My dad practically owns the stables.
translation.es: Mi papá es dueño de casi todo el establo.

translation.en: We can show you how things really work around here.
translation.es: Podemos mostrarte cómo funcionan las cosas aquí.

translation.en: - Take my number. We should hang out. - Oh.
translation.es: Anota mi número. Deberíamos pasar tiempo juntas.

translation.en: Are you two still here?
Bye, then.
- I hope you find your sister. - Wait, wait.
translation.es: - Ojalá encuentres a tu hermana. - Esperen.

translation.en: Uh, you know, my phone died.
- Oh. - Yeah, it does that sometimes.
Especially when people are being mean.
translation.es: En especial cuando la gente es mala.

translation.en: - I don't think I get your meaning. - No, I think you do.
translation.es: - Creo que no te entiendo. - No, yo creo que sí.

translation.en: Suit yourself.
Girls, would you mind staying away from my horse?
translation.es: Niñas, ¿les molestaría alejarse de mi caballo?

translation.en: He's had such a crazy day.
Raven is your horse?
That's right, he's mine.
But don't worry,
there are plenty of other horses in the stables suitable for tourists.
translation.es: Hay muchos más caballos en el establo para los turistas.

translation.en: I can send you that photo, so you have something to remember him by.
translation.es: Puedo enviarte la foto, así tienes un recuerdo de él.

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
We'll have to go to the haystack. The Wi- Fi's strongest there.
translation.es: Hay que ir al granero. Allí el wifi es más fuerte.

translation.en: You guys have Wi- Fi?
- What are you doing? - Oh.
Hey, sis.
I was just texting Angela and she said that they're having a really good time.
translation.es: Le enviaba mensajes a Angela. Dice que se están divirtiendo.

translation.en: We thought a wild horse had run off with you.
translation.es: Creímos que un caballo salvaje huyó contigo.

translation.en: A wild horse? Get a grip, sis.
- You found her, then? - Yes. Now we're leaving.
Why the rush?
Hi, my name's Rosie, but you can call me Rosie.
translation.es: Hola, mi nombre es Rosie, pero puedes llamarme Rosie.

translation.en: - Or just call me. -
Ignore her. Home. Now.
- Call me. - I'll see you around.
Oh, my God. Hot Marcus totally looked at your face.
translation.es: Dios mío. Lindo Marcus te miró a la cara.

translation.en: Don't most people look at your face when they're talking to you?
translation.es: ¿La gente no mira a la cara cuando le habla a alguien?

translation.en: I'd steer clear if I were you.
translation.es: En tu lugar, no me acercaría a él.

translation.en: Mia's basically cocked her leg and peed on him.
translation.es: Mia básicamente levantó una pata y le orinó encima.

translation.en: - That's disgusting. - Excuse me.
What happened to Home. Now?
I'm coming.
Thank you guys so much. I'll see you later.
translation.es: Chicas, muchísimas gracias. Nos vemos después.

translation.en: Wait.
Um, just wondering-- Maybe not.
translation.es: Solo me preguntaba... Tal vez no.

translation.en: You've probably got way better offers-- - She's asking for your number. - Oh.
translation.es: - Debes tener ofertas mucho mejores... - Te está pidiendo tu número.

translation.en: You told Mia your phone was dead.
Give me them digits.
Make sure you put all the sedatives back in the medical cabinet.
translation.es: Asegúrate de devolver todos los sedantes al botiquín médico.

translation.en: - Can't afford to buy more right now. - Yeah, of course.
translation.es: - No podemos comprar más ahora. - Por supuesto.

translation.en: - Luckily, we didn't have to use any today. - I know. Thanks to that girl.
translation.es: - Por suerte, hoy no usamos ninguno. - Lo sé. Gracias a esa chica.

translation.en: - Zoe. - Right.
- I still can't get over it. - I know, she was amazing.
I put Raven in the field. He was going crazy in his stable.
translation.es: Llevé a Raven al potrero de detrás. Estaba loco en su establo.

translation.en: I'll bring him in before it gets dark. Better safe than sorry at the moment.
translation.es: Lo entraré antes que oscurezca. Mejor seguro que arrepentido.

translation.en: Mom was really worried.
Mom gets worried if I walk under a ladder.
translation.es: Mamá se preocupa si paso bajo una escalera.

translation.en: Just because you can't get Wi- Fi, doesn't mean you can go off and disappear.
translation.es: Que no tengas wifi por dos minutos no significa que puedas desaparecer.

translation.en: You know I feel funny when I can't get online.
translation.es: Sabes que me siento rara si no puedo conectarme.

translation.en: You are not a baby, Ro.
Then stop treating me like one.
translation.es: Entonces, no me trates como tal.

translation.en: Dad chose not to come with us, didn't he?
translation.es: Papá eligió no venir con nosotras, ¿verdad?

translation.en: No, he had work. You know that.
- He's busy. - Whatever.
As soon as we get to Grandpa's, I'm Googling the Constitution.
translation.es: Al llegar a casa del abuelo, buscaré la Constitución en Google.

translation.en: What the...?
- What? - Nothing.
translation.es: ¿Qué? Nada. Me pregunto por qué no saliste por el portón.

translation.en: I'm wondering why you didn't use the gate.
translation.es: Nada. Me pregunto por qué no saliste por el portón.

translation.en: Spying, are you?
Spying? No, I'm not spying. I'm just passing.
translation.es: Claro que no. Pasaba por aquí.

translation.en: - I'm staying with my grandpa. - I know.
translation.es: - Vine a casa de mi abuelo. - Lo sé.

translation.en: Have a look.
- What? - You obviously think I'm up to something.
translation.es: - ¿Qué? - Es obvio que crees que tramo algo.

translation.en: So, go on. Have a look.
- No, thanks. - Suit yourself.
Mysterious bags and boys coming out of bushes.
translation.es: Bolsos misteriosos y chicos que salen de los arbustos.

translation.en: Ah, this place has got it all.
Looks like Frank's got guests up at the house.
translation.es: Frank tiene huéspedes en su casa.

translation.en: - A woman and-- - The girl who brought the dark horse in.
translation.es: - Una mujer y... - La chica que trajo el caballo.

translation.en: - There's something about her. - Ah.
- The way she handled Raven, I mean... -
translation.es: La forma en que trató a Raven...

translation.en: She's different.
A girl like that will break your heart given half a chance.
translation.es: Una chica así te romperá el corazón si tiene oportunidad.

translation.en: - Who said I'd give her a chance? - I mean it, son.
translation.es: - ¿Quién le dará oportunidad? - En serio, hijo.

translation.en: - Leave well alone. - What's it to you?
Her family are trouble.
You think everyone's trouble.
Don't say I didn't warn you.
translation.es: No digas que no te lo advertí.

translation.en: Right, that's one very grubby daughter in the bath.
translation.es: Vaya, esa niña que se está bañando sí que está sucia.

translation.en: - Where exactly did you find her? - The stables.
- The stables? - Mm- hmm. Yeah, they had Wi- Fi.
Poor you, having to deal with a bunch of pony princesses.
translation.es: Pobrecita, tuviste que tratar con las princesas de los ponis.

translation.en: No, they weren't--
Tomorrow I'll go into the village and set Grandpa up with the Internet.
translation.es: Mañana iré a la aldea y contrataré Internet.

translation.en: Oh, no. I don't need you coming over here, bringing all your new- fangled LA ideas.
translation.es: No necesito que vengas y traigas tus ideas modernas de Los Ángeles.

translation.en: It's not an LA thing. It's the whole world.
translation.es: No es algo de Los Ángeles. Es de todo el mundo.

translation.en: - It's about time you caught up. -
translation.es: Es hora de ponerte al día.

translation.en: Mom, where's my strawberry glitter shampoo?
translation.es: Mamá, ¿dónde está mi champú de fresa con brillos?

translation.en: So, you liked the stables, then?
Yeah, yeah, I did.
Bright Fields is a good place.
translation.es: Bright Fields es un buen lugar.

translation.en: I just hope young Sam can keep it going.
translation.es: Ojalá la joven Sam pueda mantenerlo a flote.

translation.en: - Mom doesn't seem to think much of it. -
translation.es: - A mamá parece no gustarle. - Lo sé.

translation.en: Maggie's always been more of a city girl.
translation.es: Maggie siempre fue una chica de ciudad.

translation.en: Now, where were we?
What are you doing up here?
This better be good. I'm about to dive into a world of knights and ghosts and--
translation.es: Más vale que sea bueno. Iba a entrar a un mundo de caballeros y fantasmas y...

translation.en: Vampire cats?
Myths and Legends.
I used to love that book when I was your age.
translation.es: A tu edad me encantaba ese libro.

translation.en: I wanted to say thank you for today.
translation.es: Quería agradecerte por lo de hoy.

translation.en: You've been a star.
- I'm sorry for being such a-- - Massively overprotective drama queen?
translation.es: - Disculpa si fui... - ¿Una reina gigante del drama?

translation.en: I was gonna go with concerned mom.
Having Rosie to chase round the island will give you something to do this summer.
translation.es: Perseguir a Rosie por la isla será una buena tarea para el verano.

translation.en: Mm, right after I come up with new and interesting ways to lie about Dad.
translation.es: Después de pensar en mentiras nuevas e interesantes sobre papá.

translation.en: - I'm sorry, Mom-- - It's okay.
Your dad and I just need a bit of time apart to figure out...
translation.es: Tu papá y yo necesitamos tiempo para resolver...

translation.en: where we're going wrong.
Yeah. Yeah.
Enjoy the book.
Thank you.
And now, finally, the total peace and quiet can begin.
translation.es: Y ahora, finalmente, puede comenzar toda la paz y la tranquilidad.

translation.en: No more panicking moms, no more lost sisters,
translation.es: Basta de madres aterradas, basta de hermanas perdidas

translation.en: and no more dangerous wild horses.
translation.es: y basta de caballos salvajes peligrosos.

translation.en: I said, no more wild horses.
Check me out, totally resisting.
Nope, mnh- mnh, not interested.
Ah... who am I kidding?
Hey.
Hey.
Hey, boy. Hey.
I just wanted to come and say good night.
translation.es: Vine a darte las buenas noches.

translation.en: We're famous.
Hey. What's wrong?
Is someone there?
Tch. It's okay. It's just you and me.
translation.es: Tranquilo. Solo estamos tú y yo.

translation.en: There's nothing to be scared of.
I promise.
